_sText:
**Added 7 spawns to each side, complete retexturing, and better centerpiece.  Eveything is running** **smoothly and I hope everyone likes this!                                                                              **

(Same weapons as in last version)
As you climb the stairs, each platform will have 4 weapons.  First two platforms are pistols, next two is the subs, then 1 set of rifles.  On the top you can eather pickup a weapon or buy one on the bridge.  The weapons on the top are 4 beasts. (duel elites, deagle, m249, autosniper)

It sounds and looks easy, but once you have enough people playing, it's gonna be next to impossible to reach the top.

*secret button*
"will allow the other side to be seen"-Sorry, you gotta find it for yourself though!
